function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on pandemic risks in health club facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and public health concerns","Mitigation":"Include research and guidelines for pandemic preparedness in health club facilities","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV sterilization, touchless technology","People":"Customers, staff, and general public","Owner":"Health club owners, management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate focus on cleanliness and maintenance","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission and hygiene-related issues","Mitigation":"Implement regular cleaning schedules, maintenance protocols, and hygiene training","Technologies":"Cleaning robots, UV disinfection, self-cleaning surfaces","People":"Customers, staff, and general public","Owner":"Health club owners, management, cleaning staff"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for accessibility and safety for physically challenged individuals","Impact":"Exclusion of a marginalized group and potential safety hazards","Mitigation":"Ensure accessibility measures, safety protocols, and inclusive design for individuals with disabilities","Technologies":"Accessible equipment, emergency response systems, inclusive facility design","People":"Physically challenged individuals, customers, staff","Owner":"Health club owners, facility managers, accessibility experts"}]}
